name: A Improbable Mage
description: For some reason you cursed yourself with RNG for no reason. So now you to cycle between your 6 weapons randomly between each attack. Each attack does different damage, and each projectile has different attributes. E/Q to teleport which has a cooldown of a few seconds. There's only two enemies right now, and the knight has higher health. As time goes on, the waves become harder.
